## Used packages and librarys:

Advice: Only install package once, otherwise load library


```{r}
install.packages("sf")
```

```{r}
library(sf)
```

```{r}
install.packages("ggplot2")
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

Packages for adjustments (e.g. set the color palette)

```{r}
install.packages("viridis")
install.packages("gridExtra")
install.packages("viridisLite")
```

```{r}
library(gridExtra)
library(viridisLite)
library(viridis)
```

Packages for other/further applications:

```{r}
install.packages("terra")
```

```{r}
install.packages("sp")
```

```{r}
install.packages("raster")
```

```{r}
install.packages("exactextractr")
```

```{r}
library(sf)
library(sp)
library(terra)
library(raster)
library(ggplot2)
library(exactextractr)
```
